get.summary: Suggests matching Identifier entities based on the query and entity_def_ids provided.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Value to perform the autocomplete search with.

parameters.name: collection_ids
parameters.description:
A comma separated list of collection ids to search against. Leaving this blank means it will search across
all identifiers. Entity defs can be constrained to specific facets by providing them as facet collections.
Relationship collections will resolve to their underlying entity def. \
Collection ids are: organizations, people, funding_rounds, acquisitions, investments, events,
press_references, funds, event_appearances, ipos, ownerships, categories, category_groups, locations, jobs

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to retrieve; default = 10, max = 25

parameters.name: collection_ids
parameters.description:
Filter by collection id(s). Comma separated list of collection ids.\
E.g. organizations, people, funding_rounds, acquisitions, investments, events, press_references, funds,
event_appearances, ipos, ownerships, categories, category_groups, locations, jobs

parameters.name: before_id
parameters.description:
Used to paginate search results to the previous page. before_id should be the uuid of the first item in
the current page. May not be provided simultaneously with after_id.

parameters.name: after_id
parameters.description:
Used to paginate search results to the next page. after_id should be the uuid of the last item in
the current page. May not be provided simultaneously with before_id.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of rows to return. Default is 100, min is 1, max is 2000.

parameters.name: deleted_at_order
parameters.description: Direction of sorting by deleted_at property

fieldIdsParam.description: Fields to include on the resulting entity - either an array of field_id strings in JSON or a comma-separated list encoded as string

cardFieldIdsParam.name: card_field_ids
cardFieldIdsParam.description: Card fields to include on the specified card - array of field_id strings in JSON encoded as string

cardIdsParam.name: card_ids
cardIdsParam.description: Cards to include on the resulting entity - either an array of card_id strings in JSON or a comma-separated list encoded as string

cardIdParam.name: card_id
cardIdParam.description: A card to include on the resulting entity

afterIdParam.name: after_id
afterIdParam.description:
Lookup uuid of the last item in the previous page (not required for first page). Used to iterate a card's
results starting at the beginning of the ordered set and moving forward. Suitable for implementing "next page"
functionality. May not be provided simultaneously with before_id.

beforeIdParam.name: before_id
beforeIdParam.description:
Lookup uuid of the first item in the previous page (not required for first page). Used to iterate a card's
results starting at the end of the ordered set and moving backward. Suitable for implementing "previous page"
functionality. May not be provided simultaneously with after_id.

limitParam.name: limit
limitParam.description: Number of rows to return. Default is 100, min is 1, max is 100.

OperatorsEnum.description:
Description of operators:
 * blank - Blank
 * eq - Equal
 * not_eq - Not equal
 * gt - Greater than
 * gte - Greater than or equal
 * lt - Less than
 * lte - Less than or equal
 * starts - Starts
 * contains - Contains
 * between - Between
 * includes - Includes
 * not_includes - Does not include
 * includes_all - Includes all
 * not_includes_all - Does not include all
 * domain_eq - Domain equals
 * domain_blank - Domain is blank

values.description: values array with data type matching field_id type
